WorkItem.Description:
Looking for the following scenario:

Pre-requisite: The code should in __WPF + MEF + PRISM__

1. Popup a child window or a user control from within main window
2. Create region in child windows or user control or a dialog
3. Manage reigon with reigon in child window or user control or a dialog
4. Create and manage mutiple shells 


<Sample Code would help the most, along with explaination>
WorkItem.Summary: Creating & Managing Reigon with Child window or a dialog

Comments.Message: There are less number of samples when it comes to MEF, WPF & PRISM online
